No. COA18-1058 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 20, 2019

In the MATTER OF the Foreclosure of a Deed of Trust executed by Wendy S. STEPHENS and Mark T. Stephens in the original amount of $154,800.00 dated August 10, 2005, recorded in Book 11562, Page 2594, Wake County Registry

AFFIRMED.
